com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core.SceneObject
      • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.netcode.NetworkedSceneObject
        • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.graphics.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Anchorable

    public class Text
extends NetworkedSceneObject
implements Anchorable
    This class stores data about a text string that we want to render to the screen.
